text: anta nampikkaiyalarkalutaiya ullankalil (islamin mulam) anpai utti (citarikkitanta avarkalai) onru certtan. Pumiyilulla anaittaiyum nir celavu ceytapotilum avarkalutaiya ullankalil anpaiyutta um'mal mutiyatu. Eninum, allahtan avarkalai (anpin mulam) onru certtan. Niccayamaka avan (anaittaiyum) mikaittavan, nanamutaiyavan
